name: Maria X Martinez Health Resource Center (Urgent Care Clinic)
description: Tom Waddell Urgent Care Clinic has been renamed. The new name is Maria X Martinez Health Resource Center current San Francisco Health Network patients who have an injury or illness that needs immediate attention, but is not serious enough for an emergency room visit. - For a medical emergency, call 911 or go to the nearest emergency room. How to Apply: - Call to see if you can see your regular doctor- (628) 217-5800 - On Monday to Saturday, 8:30AM to 5PM: Follow the prompts to speak with a nurse
